descriptions.description: Converts between text files with DOS, UNIX or MAC line breaks
dos2unix includes utilities to convert text files with DOS or MAC line breaks to Unix line breaks and vice versa. It also includes conversion of UTF-16 to UTF-8.

download.info: The main package contains the man pages only. This archive additionally contains htm, pdf, ps, and txt documents in nl, en, and es language.

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegimport libiconv-1.14 oegimport gettext-0.18.3 oegextract dos2unix-6.0.3.tar.gz # ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz #RPM_OPT_FLAGS is a way to add our search path for the libs RPM_OPT_FLAGS="-L/open-egovernment/lib" make -f mingw.mak make -f mingw.mak strip make -f mingw.mak install prefix=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} # prefix is only an installation prefix cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}" # path changed oegarchive dos2unix-6.0.3 # ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
